import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState, refClose } from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import noteContext from "../context/notes/noteContex" import Noteitem from './Noteitem' import AddNote from './AddNote' const Notes = () => { const context = useContext(noteContext) const { notes, getnotes } = context useEffect(() => { getnotes() // eslint-disable-next-line }, []) const [note, setNote] = useState({ etitle: "", edescription: "", etag: "" }) const updateNote = (currentNote) => { ref.current.click() setNote({ etitle: currentNote.title, edescription: currentNote.description, etag: currentNote.tag }) } const handleclick = (e) => { console.log(note) e.preventDefault() } const onchange = (e) => { setNote({ ...note, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const ref = useRef(null) return ( <>
Edit Note

Your notes

{notes.length === 0 && "No notes to display"}
{notes.map((note) => { return })}
) } export default Notes
